Transaction ID.description: Unique identifier for each transaction, should not be null.

Customer ID.description: Unique identifier for each customer, should not be null.

Item.description: Identifier for the item sold, should be cleaned to remove unnecessary prefixes.

Price Per Unit.description: Price per unit of the item, should not be negative or null.

Quantity.description: Quantity of the item sold, should be a non-negative integer.

Total Spent.description: Total amount spent in the transaction, should be non-negative if both quantity and price are available.

Payment Method.description: Method of payment used in the transaction.

Location.description: Location where the transaction took place.

Transaction Date.description: Date of the transaction, should be in a valid date format.

Discount Applied.description: Indicates whether a discount was applied to the transaction.
